channel.title: Steenscape developement ~
channel.description:
[b]Steenscape![/b]
~._.~ [b]Steenscape[/b] ~._.~ Steenscape is my first server, don't think it will be REALLY good, it is just an training for me, like coding, ect. When i'm getting good at it, i am do one of these things: 1-Stop with steenscape, and start againt..;This is if it wont is a really good server... 2-Or im going further with steenscape; This is if i get many help and many players..
~._.~ [b]Me[/b] ~._.~ Im a stupid newb here, total login of 17 hours, but i was reading things alike 16 hours. The first thing i did what request a server (Stupid..) But that was very noobish. Im a ROM hacker, an Pokémon ROM hacker, and my scripting there is.. Very Good. :) Im coding/Texting/ Ect. all alone, and i want Steenscape become a cool, popular server. Alone i can't really do MANY, Im sure there a things i NEVER should learn, Or maybe at the last moment..
I already started steenscape, i use "Project16_v6_EDIT_8" as source, i tested many source'es and like this the most.
~._.~ [b]Features[/b] ~._.~ Steenscape features FULL ancients, Maybe lunar magic! im trying to get ALL skills in (jaj) It will be playing at many places; And places that aren't used many. So NO varrock. 8D Ring of stone, Fire cape. Dialoges, i think.. Kalphite Queen, Barrows, maybe Pest control, King Black Dragon lair, maybe Tz-haar-City, Jad, more things like these. :P An updated Pk place (Now v1)
I hope the mods/admins/co-owner i choose are friendly ; But everyone that helps a littlebit i should give credits..
~._.~ [b]Help[/b] ~._.~
Ye, maybe YOU wanna help steenscape! Almost everyone can help! And someone who helps REALLY good maybe becomes staff... This are things i really dont understand: (I already expiremented with the things)
-How to edit start coords, in my source you always start at lummy tele point, so i dont know what to edit..
These things i need: - Some cool things for the server. :P
Im trying to get my dad so far that he set up a old stupid Pc as server. Im gonna delete ALL shit form it. 8D If that won't luck, maybe one of you wanna host! :/ [i]Note: Something forget a open post? Just say.. Question about Steenscape? Just say...[/i]
~._.~ [b]Currently doing[/b] ~._.~ Currently adding item, like Ring Of Stone trying to get a server Pc here at my home.

item.title: Steenscape developement ~
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

ILL help out with this,

the source i have wrote has

  • fully working npc attack strength def levels
  • Dwarf cannon spins and fires in direction. (Cannon Ball GFX)
  • Teleports, random teleport loacations insted of just one place it will tele u in the area
  • PVP, loads all weapons spells and arrows from a cfg file and uses grafics in the config files
  • PVP Atack Str and def works for NPC’s vs Npcs, NPC’s VS players, players VS players
  • Tutorial island 100% done with Tutorial completion bar and walk through door then closes
  • Some specials MAde by Sufix
  • 100% runecrafting abbys or no abbys “KIAZ Runecraft Code”
  • adding more later

If you need help codeing any of these or any thing else MESSAGE ME

Read full topic

item.title: Steenscape developement ~
item.dc:creator: @Steen Steen
item.description:
@Steen wrote:

Steenscape!

~..~ Steenscape ~..~
Steenscape is my first server, don’t think it will be REALLY good, it is just an training for me, like coding, ect.
When i’m getting good at it, i am do one of these things:
1-Stop with steenscape, and start againt…;This is if it wont is a really good server…
2-Or im going further with steenscape; This is if i get many help and many players…

~..~ Me ~..~
Im a stupid newb here, total login of 17 hours, but i was reading things alike 16 hours.
The first thing i did what request a server (Stupid…) But that was very noobish.
Im a ROM hacker, an Pokémon ROM hacker, and my scripting there is… Very Good.
Im coding/Texting/ Ect. all alone, and i want Steenscape become a cool, popular server.
Alone i can’t really do MANY, Im sure there a things i NEVER should learn, Or maybe at the last moment…

I already started steenscape, i use “Project16_v6_EDIT_8” as source, i tested many source’es and like this the most.

~..~ Features ~..~
Steenscape features FULL ancients, Maybe lunar magic! im trying to get ALL skills in (jaj) It will be playing at many places; And places that aren’t used many. So NO varrock. 8D
Ring of stone, Fire cape.
Dialoges, i think…
Kalphite Queen, Barrows, maybe Pest control, King Black Dragon lair, maybe Tz-haar-City, Jad, more things like these.
An updated Pk place (Now v1)

I hope the mods/admins/co-owner i choose are friendly ; But everyone that helps a littlebit i should give credits…

~..~ Help ~..~

Ye, maybe YOU wanna help steenscape!
Almost everyone can help!
And someone who helps REALLY good maybe becomes staff…
This are things i really dont understand:
(I already expiremented with the things)

-How to edit start coords, in my source you always start at lummy tele point, so i dont know what to edit…

These things i need:

  • Some cool things for the server.

Im trying to get my dad so far that he set up a old stupid Pc as server. Im gonna delete ALL shit form it. 8D
If that won’t luck, maybe one of you wanna host!
Note: Something forget a open post? Just say…
Question about Steenscape? Just say…

~..~ Currently doing ~..~
Currently adding item, like Ring Of Stone trying to get a server Pc here at my home.

Read full topic
